full_summary:
#Eric Vettoretti - Advance Contract Award Notice for Pharmaceuticals
=============================

## Overview

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is soliciting services for the procurement of pharmaceuticals under the Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) WS3695876516.

## Details

*   **Reference Number:** WS3695876516
*   **Amendment Number:** 1
*   **Solicitation Number:** WS3695876516
*   **Publication Date:** February 28, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** Cancelled
*   **Expected Contract Start Date:** July 1, 2023
*   **Expected Contract End Date:** None

## Type of Notice

This is an Advance Contract Award Notice (ACAN) for the procurement of pharmaceuticals. The procurement category is Goods and Services (GD) and the selection criteria are based on Lowest Price.

## Regional Delivery

The deliveries will take place in the following regions:

*   Alberta
*   British Columbia
*   Ontario (except National Capital Region)
*   Yukon
*   Newfoundland and Labrador
*   Quebec (except National Capital Region)
*   Saskatchewan
*   Manitoba
*   Northwest Territories
*   Nova Scotia
*   Prince Edward Island
*   Nunavut Territory
*   New Brunswick

## Agreements and Trade

This procurement will be conducted in accordance with the following trade agreements:

*   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
*   Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
*   Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
*   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
*   Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
*   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
*   Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
*   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
*   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
*   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

## Contact Information

For more information, please contact Eric Vettoretti at eric.vettoretti@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

The complete notice can be accessed at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15552959
